item.title: AWS Certificate Management and WordPress
item.description: Create AWS Certificate Open AWS Console. Services > Security > Certificate Manager. Select Request Certificate Type domain name and click Review & Request Review the domain and Confirm and Request. An email will be sent to the webmaster/hostmaster/admin Once you have received to the email click on the link within the email to approve the request. Binding the Certificate to an EC2 Instance / Elastic Load Balancer (ELB)
